feed.title: Invoice Ninja Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.50
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for ZugferdDocument creation for VAT not registered businesses
  • v5.11.50 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10731

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.49...v5.11.50

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.51
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • exclude vendor folder second attempt by @benbrummer in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10642
  • v5.11.51 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10733

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.50...v5.11.51

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.52
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Upgrade Stripe iDeal integration to 2.0
  • Client Locations
  • Updates / Checks for expired requisitions for GoCardless
  • Update translations by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10737
  • Implement missing method by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10736
  • v5.11.52 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10743

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.51...v5.11.52

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.53
New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.54
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Updates for readme by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10747
  • Minor updates for admin by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10749
  • Roll back for admin by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10750
  • Fixes for statements + unapplied payments by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10751

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.53...v5.11.54
